text: The Sehol X8 is a mid-size Crossover SUV made by the Chinese car company JAC Motors. Under the Sehol sub-brand It was first introduced as the JAC Jiayue X8 but was later rebranded as Sehol. == History == The Sehol X8 was first announced in May 2020 and was officially revealed at the Chengdu Auto Show in July 2020. It became available for sale in China starting in October 2020. == Markets == The Sehol X8 is also sold in other countries under different names. In Russia, it is sold as the Moskvitch 8. In Mexico, it is sold as the JAC Sei 7 Pro, and in Italy, it is marketed as the EVO 7. == Features == The Sehol X8 has a 1.5-liter turbocharged four-cylinder engine that produces 135 kW (184 horsepower). It comes with a standard 6-speed manual transmission, with an optional 6-speed dual-clutch transmission. == Sehol X8 Plus == The Sehol X8 Plus is an updated version of the Sehol X8. It was launched in July 2022 and is slightly larger and more premium than the original X8. The main change is a redesign of the front and rear of the car, adding 10 mm to its total length. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: JAC X8
